definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: The sound of the lute is soaring and majestic like Mount Tai.
sentences.chinese: 琴聲中表達出來的意象象高峻雄偉得像泰山一樣。

sentences.english: The setting, at the foot of the Alps, is majestic.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾卑斯山腳的環境雄偉壯麗。

sentences.english: They saw the lofty peak in all its majesty.
sentences.chinese: 他們看到了高聳的山峯，氣勢雄偉壯麗。

sentences.english: The Bell Tower in Xi'an was not only built earlier, but also taller than any other in the country.
sentences.chinese: 因而西安的鐘樓不但修的早，而且也修得高大雄偉。

sentences.english: Tall majestic monastery, with the typical architectural style of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 該寺高大雄偉，具有典型的明代建築風格。

sentences.english: The entire place palace has the bright Tibet typestyle, according to Shan Erjian, imposing.
sentences.chinese: 整座宮殿具有鮮明的藏式風格，依山而建，氣勢雄偉。

sentences.english: You're the mountain huge and high.
Obviously, this aircraft carrier is the unusual grandness .
sentences.chinese: 可見，這艘航母是非常的雄偉。

sentences.english: is a magnificent structure with a square base and a circular top.
sentences.chinese: 是一個擁有方底圓頂的雄偉建築。

sentences.english: Teens were thinking big but lacked opportunities to act big.
sentences.chinese: 青少年有很多的雄偉的想法，但缺乏付之行動的機會。

sentences.english: It stands in the Yellow Sea lake, tall and majestic.
sentences.chinese: 它聳立在黃海之濱，高大雄偉。

sentences.english: Donne cannot rival Milton in grandeur and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 論雄偉優美，多恩無法與彌爾頓匹敵。

sentences.english: The foreign tourists were moved by the magnificent view of the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 雄偉長城的英姿使外國遊客感動不已。

sentences.english: My new school looks much more magnificent than my old one.
sentences.chinese: 我的新校，比舊的那一間更看來雄偉壯觀。

sentences.english: Here has blue sky, great snow mountain and eternal and alone island of sea heart.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有湛藍的天空，雄偉的雪山，永恆孤獨的海心島。

definition: gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
